localString.value: A small drawer extends beneath the gleaming tabletop. It probably doubles as a desk when there's the need.
Low and flat, this chest seems to have been designed for the storage and filing of a merchant's accounts.
The antique drawer pulls are touched by rust and the drawers themselves fit ill within their sockets. It seems the damp air has not been kind to this piece.
The smell of mothballs has long since seeped into the wood of this armoire.
A small chest for storing valuables.
A small pile of baubles of indeterminate value.
The little sack is made of fine-spun cotton, tightly stitched.
The little sack is made of fine-spun cotton, tightly stitched.
